text: - AWS really helps us to scale up and down
and to manage that growth in a way
that keeps our teams from having

to worry about infrastructure
in a direct day-to-day way.
To really focus on delivering experiences

to our customers.
From making aggressive use
of auto-scaling everywhere we can,

to building a custom,
auto-scaling engine of our own
that really follows player demand,
to looking at things like savings plan

and reserve instances to make
the most out of every dollar
that we spend on infrastructure.

- NAB Connect is our premier
business banking platform.
AWS has bought resilience to NAB Connect
because we're taking advantage
of the cloud native auto-healing
and auto-scaling capabilities.

We're able to detect issues
happening in the platform

before they happen and
automatically remediate them

before the customers get
to see what's happening.
- Our incidents have dropped
by 87% since we've moved to cloud.

On top of all that, the
culture of innovation

that they brought to our
teams was just amazing
and enabled us to really think through

how we would implement
things in different ways.
- Working with AWS, we found

that world-class partner
providing cloud services
to support clinical

and administrative systems
that we were supplying
for our 14 hospitals.

It has delivered both in terms
of performance, scalability,

cost management, and also
improved our security footprint.
Healthcare has often been looked at
as an industry that moves slowly.
I think what we've been able to prove

and demonstrate here is
with the support of AWS,
we have in fact moved quickly
and have been leaders in this space.
